participant_1.background:
My morning routine begins with checking on my animals and tending to the crops.
I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year.
I ate a delicious cake at my silver themed birthday party.
i like to write my own songs.
i like to work with acrylics.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy playing Magic: the Gathering in my free time.
I'm going to the park with my pug, Corky.
I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike.
I take pride in my appearance.

content.text: Hello, I'm a farmer, baker, and artist. I run my own small farm and I just finished a beautiful painting of my farm. What do you do in your spare time?
Hi there, I enjoy playing magic the gathering, hiking, and spending time with my pug Corky. I'm not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I do love my dog and my Subaru outback.
That sounds like a lovely life, how long have you been playing Magic? My pug's name is Max and he's my best friend.
I've been playing for about 10 years now, I love the strategy and the community. I've had Corky for 5 years now, he's the best.
I've heard it's a really fun game, I might have to give it a try. I'm so glad you have a good friend in Corky, I feel the same way about Max.
You definitely should, it's a great way to meet new people. Max is a great dog, I'm so lucky to have him.
I'm going to look into it, thanks for the recommendation. How old is Corky?
He's 9 years old, but he still acts like a puppy
